s.text: A toy company's stock rose 20 percent when it won the license to distribute Spice Girl action figures.
During their rise to fame, the girls wisely avoided giving concerts; when they finally performed live (on Saturday Night Live ), critics panned them.
"Spice Up Your Life," for example, is Latin pop, while "The Lady Is a Vamp" is a big-band tune.
Children will buy Spice Girl-shaped chocolates, Polaroid Spicecams plastered with Spice Girl stickers, and Spice Girl deodorant--in one of five different Spice scents.
